subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant had 35 points and 10 assists to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to the N.B.A. finals with a Game 6 victory over the Denver Nuggets.
snippet: Kobe Bryant had 35 points and 10 assists to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to the N.B.A. finals with a Game 6 victory over the Denver Nuggets.
